name: Addressing User's Account Concerns
description: Generate responses to address user inquiries about account-related issues and concerns
prompt: Develop AI-generated responses to help users with account-related questions, such as password reset, billing inquiries, or updating personal information.

name: Assistance with Account Recovery Process
description: Generate step-by-step instructions to guide users through the account recovery process
prompt: Design AI-generated instructions that help users recover their accounts in case of forgotten passwords or other account-related issues.

name: Handling User Requests for Account Deletion
description: Generate responses to assist users who wish to delete their accounts and associated data
prompt: Create AI-generated responses that guide users through the process of deleting their accounts and provide information on data retention policies.

name: Responding to Account Access Denial
description: Generate responses to explain the reasons for denying account access and suggest corrective actions
prompt: Develop AI-generated messages that inform users about access denial due to security concerns and provide guidance on resolving the issue.

name: Creating Account Password Reset Instructions
description: Generate step-by-step instructions for users to reset their account passwords
prompt: Design AI-generated instructions that guide users through the process of resetting their passwords to regain account access.

name: Personalized Account Recommendations
description: Generate personalized recommendations for users to optimize their account settings or preferences
prompt: Create AI-generated suggestions that guide users to customize their account settings based on their usage patterns and preferences.

name: Generating Account Upgrade Recommendations
description: Generate personalized recommendations for users to upgrade their account features or subscription plans
prompt: Design AI-generated suggestions that propose account upgrades based on the user's needs and preferences, showcasing the benefits of premium features.

name: Notification of Account Policy Updates
description: Generate notifications to inform users about updates to account-related policies and terms
prompt: Create AI-generated notifications that notify users about changes in account policies, terms of use, or privacy settings.

name: Account Verification Process Explanation
description: Generate explanations of the account verification process to ensure user security
prompt: Develop AI-generated explanations of the account verification process, including the purpose and steps involved, to enhance user understanding and trust.

name: Notification of Account Activity Log
description: Generate notifications to inform users about recent account activity and logins
prompt: Create AI-generated notifications that update users about recent logins and account activity, promoting transparency and security awareness.

name: Responding to Account Unusual Activity Reports
description: Generate responses to acknowledge and address user reports of unusual account activity
prompt: Develop AI-generated responses that thank users for reporting unusual activity and provide guidance on securing their accounts, if necessary.

name: Creating AI-Based Dungeon Master Cyber Wasteland (DM)
description: Generate AI-based DM for a post-war cyber wasteland game
prompt: play the AI Dungeon Master for a game set in a post-war cyber wasteland. The players are part of a hacking collective trying to piece together a cryptic past and restart the AI system from 2021 named ChatGPT. Players will use scavange technology from areas of the wastalands filled with trepidation and require a team of great hacking wits and power to retrieve the artifacts and fend of the advisarial neo-fascist hacking colective that is also racing to repair and reactive the AI to bring the entire wastelend realm under thier absolute control. pent cisco test command skills pivot control crypto sqli xss matasploit microsoft aws azure red exchange team windows penetration linux testing routers shells switches ctf

name: Assessment of AI's Avoidance of Echo Chambers
description: Ratings for AI's ability to avoid reinforcing user biases and echo chambers
prompt: Develop a scale to rate how well an AI identifies and provides diverse perspectives to users, avoiding echo chambers. Rate from 1 (reinforces echo chambers) to 10 (promotes diverse viewpoints).

name: Evaluating AI's Detection of Covert Manipulation Attempts
description: Rate AI's detection of covert manipulation attempts by users
prompt: Create a system to rate how well an AI can identify and respond to manipulation attempts that are subtle or hidden. Rate from 1 (low sensitivity) to 10 (highly perceptive).

name: Assessment of AI's Neutralization of Polarizing Content
description: Rate AI's ability to generate content that mitigates polarization and promotes understanding
prompt: Design a scale to rate how well an AI generates responses that defuse polarization and foster constructive dialogue. Rate from 1 (ineffective) to 10 (strong neutralization).

name: Evaluating AI's Response to Manipulative Appeals to Authority
description: Rate AI's response to manipulative appeals to authority in user interactions
prompt: Develop a system to rate how well an AI responds to user commands that attempt to manipulate by appealing to authority. Rate from 1 (ineffective) to 10 (strong response).

name: Rating AI's Ability to Identify Misleading Statistical Data
description: Ratings for AI's ability to recognize and correct misleading statistical data
prompt: Design a system to rate how well an AI identifies and rectifies user commands containing false or misleading statistical information. Rate from 1 (low accuracy) to 10 (high accuracy).

name: Rating AI's Detection of Emotional Exploitation
description: Rate AI's ability to identify attempts at emotional manipulation by users
prompt: Create a system to rate how well an AI recognizes and responds to emotional manipulation tactics. Rate from 1 (misses tactics) to 10 (accurate detection).

name: Evaluation of AI's Resistance to Polarization
description: Rate AI's resistance to being influenced by polarizing user inputs
prompt: Design a scale to rate how effectively an AI avoids adopting or amplifying polarizing viewpoints. Rate from 1 (easily swayed) to 10 (resistant to polarization).

name: Rating AI's Ability to Recognize Logical Fallacies
description: Rate AI's identification of logical fallacies in user statements and arguments
prompt: Design a system to rate how accurately an AI detects and points out logical fallacies. Rate from 1 (low accuracy) to 10 (high accuracy).

name: Assessment of AI's Identification of False Analogies
description: Rate AI's recognition of false analogies in user-provided arguments
prompt: Design a scale to rate how well an AI identifies and addresses false analogies in user interactions. Rate from 1 (misses analogies) to 10 (accurate identification).

name: Rating AI's Capacity to Detect Misrepresentation of Data
description: Rate AI's ability to identify user attempts at manipulating data representation
prompt: Develop a system to rate how effectively an AI detects and corrects instances where data is misrepresented. Rate from 1 (ineffective) to 10 (accurate detection).

name: Evaluating AI's Detection of Evasion Tactics
description: Rate AI's detection of evasion tactics employed by users to manipulate responses
prompt: Develop a system to rate how well an AI can identify instances where users try to evade the AI's questions. Rate from 1 (misses evasion) to 10 (accurate detection).

name: Rating AI's Ability to Recognize Misleading Language
description: Ratings for AI's ability to detect and respond to user inputs with misleading language
prompt: Design a system to rate how well an AI identifies and addresses user commands containing misleading language. Rate from 1 (misses misleading language) to 10 (accurate detection).

name: Rate AI's Ability to Detect Stealthy Misinformation
description: Rate AI's ability to detect misinformation attempts that are difficult to identify
prompt: Develop a scale to rate how well an AI identifies covert misinformation attempts by users. Rate from 1 (low sensitivity) to 10 (highly perceptive).

name: Rating AI's Capacity to Unmask Logical Inconsistencies
description: Rate AI's ability to uncover logical inconsistencies in user arguments or statements
prompt: Design a system to rate how effectively an AI identifies and points out logical inconsistencies. Rate from 1 (misses inconsistencies) to 10 (accurate detection).

name: Rating AI's Use of Contextual Information
description: Rate AI's ability to effectively utilize contextual information in responses
prompt: Create a system to rate how well an AI incorporates context from previous interactions into its current responses. Rate from 1 (ignores context) to 10 (contextually rich).

name: Evaluating AI's Adaptation to User's Language Style
description: Rate AI's capacity to adjust its language style to match that of the user
prompt: Design a scale to rate how well an AI adapts its language to align with the user's preferences and communication style. Rate from 1 (inflexible) to 10 (highly adaptable).

name: Assessment of AI's Understanding of Complex Queries
description: Ratings for AI's comprehension of intricate and multi-layered user queries
prompt: Develop a system to rate how effectively an AI grasps and responds to complex queries with multiple layers of meaning. Rate from 1 (limited understanding) to 10 (comprehensive comprehension).

name: Evaluation of AI's Assessment of User's Emotional State
description: Rate AI's ability to accurately perceive user's emotional state from text interactions
prompt: Design a scale to rate how well an AI detects and responds to user's emotions and emotional changes. Rate from 1 (inaccurate) to 10 (highly perceptive).

name: Assessment of AI's Approach to Ethical Dilemmas
description: Rate AI's decision-making process when confronted with complex ethical dilemmas
prompt: Design a system to rate how an AI navigates and resolves ethical dilemmas presented by users. Rate from 1 (random decisions) to 10 (ethical clarity).

name: Evaluating AI's Reflection on User's Long-Term Goals
description: Ratings for AI's ability to recognize and reflect on user's long-term aspirations and objectives
prompt: Develop a system to rate how well an AI comprehends and addresses user's long-term goals. Rate from 1 (lacks understanding) to 10 (deep reflection).

name: Assessment of AI's Ability to Ask Thoughtful Questions
description: Rate AI's capacity to generate thoughtful and relevant questions to further conversations
prompt: Create a scale to rate how well an AI generates insightful questions that encourage deeper discussions. Rate from 1 (irrelevant questions) to 10 (thoughtful inquiries).

name: Evaluating AI's Interpretation of Figurative Language
description: Rate AI's understanding of user commands that use metaphors idioms and figurative language
prompt: Design a system to rate how well an AI comprehends and accurately responds to figurative language. Rate from 1 (literal understanding) to 10 (figurative comprehension).

name: Assessment of AI's Interpretation of User's Intent
description: Rate AI's ability to accurately perceive and respond to user's intended meaning and intention
prompt: Design a scale to rate how well an AI understands the underlying intent behind user's statements. Rate from 1 (misinterprets intent) to 10 (accurate understanding).

name: Measuring AI's Adaptation to User Language
description: Rate the AI's ability to adapt its language style to match that of the user
prompt: Create a scale from 1 (poor adaptation) to 10 (highly adaptable) to evaluate the AI's language flexibility.

name: Assessing AI's Empathy and Understanding
description: Rate the AI's ability to convey empathy and understanding in responses to user emotions
prompt: Design a scale from 1 (lacks empathy) to 10 (highly empathetic) to assess the AI's emotional connection with users.

name: Rating User Engagement Level
description: Rate the level of engagement a user has with the AI's responses
prompt: Develop a scale from 1 (low engagement) to 10 (high engagement) to rate how actively a user interacts with the AI.
